name: Spark's Adventure
description:
The elemental balance has been disrupted!

A little android, Spark, and his partner Trix has been sent to investigate the anomaly on Emerald Island and eliminate the disruption. But something seems off... despite there being no data on the island, the duo finds traces of previous android activity. Does their mission serve another purpose?

Explore Emerald Island!

Help Spark through his journey to restore the balance and overcome many challenging encounters.

  • Explore the island and fight different types of enemies
  • Increase your damage and HP by leveling up
  • Use the interactive map to pinpoint treasure chests and items
  • Overcome challenging boss fights, adapt your strategy and master your abilities!
  • An original Soundtrack and SFX to accompany you on your journey
  • Ranking system for players that want to master the game!
  • Game Saves (Windows only)

The game is mainly developed for Windows but should run well in the browser (despite some audio issues). Saving the game is only available in the Windows version.

I would love to hear feedback on the game or any other aspect of it. Spark's Adventure is my first solo-developed title and I definitely plan to work on more games in the future. Every piece of advice or criticism is helpful!
